data.message: How do I stop people from seeing my phone numbers. Need help ,as usual.  Thank you Facebook

replies.message: Hey Monico. You can learn more about how to adjust who can see phone numbers you add to your account here: http://on.fb.me/1N6fR67. Feel free to reach out if you have more questions. -Rey
